website_summaries.verdict: This captains seat has an added feature that allows you to flip the front up for extra seat height when you need it.
pros: 2-tone design comes with several accent tone options
A comfortable seat in either position
Relatively inexpensive for a replacement seat
Quickly improves the look of your boat
cons: The design of this seat may make it uncomfortable for some  larger adults

customer_reviews.title: Good quality seat
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the seat. My wife says it is comfortable and feels more secure than the seat it replaced. We spent all day yesterday on the lake in fairly choppy water and it worked great. I did have to adjust the mounting plate because the mounting screws didn't line up properly.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Todd

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for all size drivers with the correct pedestal.
customer_reviews.text: This seat is PERFECT. My wife and I just bought a boat recently and installed this very easily, using existing holes from the previous seat. I bought the Wise 8WP21-374 pedestal with it, which makes it completely adjustible for ALL size drivers. The bolster is amazing for being able to stand and drive in comfort, allowing for sight line over the windshield. This is one of the best investments we've made so far!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: White-To-Yellow in under 30 days
customer_reviews.text: The seat turned yellow in less than 30 days of being installed. Clearly the material is not UV protected and of poor quality... Levi Bacchus answered: "Mine has done the same in less than thirty days"
customer_reviews.author: SpartanBrews

customer_reviews.title: Would have given 5 stars, but bad bolt hole
customer_reviews.text: One of the bolt holes in the bottom came loose and stuck to the bolt and now I can't get the bolt out, nor tighten it. Had to drill another hole and use one of my other bolts from my previous seats to have 4 points and then glue the remaining bolt up to the base plate so it wouldn't bounce around. Other than that issue, they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua W.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking boat seat
customer_reviews.text: Great boat seat we’ll made and good looking. Very reasonable cost for a good quality boat seat. I hope it holds up well in the salt water environment and the marine vinyl is as tough as it seems. I’ll update this review in the future.
customer_reviews.author: adn

customer_reviews.title: TURNS YELLOW
customer_reviews.text: These chairs turned yellow in less than a month! They were a very good looking and comfortable chair, but now they’re terrible and clash with the other actually white seats on the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement seat
customer_reviews.text: Captain’s chair in our runabout was coming apart. Looked at lots of choices. Picked this because good reviews and decent price. We installed it and it’s comfortable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: mysteryfan

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Little difficult to install where holes didn't line up with the holes in my pedastal, so I had to drill some extra holes. Seat is comfortable but bolster is a little soft so it sinks down some making it lower than I would like. Probably will buy a different pedastal to get a little more height. Seems like good quality and looks good in the boat.
customer_reviews.author: travis c.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: First let me say that if you order this make sure it is 100% what you want because it is going to cost you if you return it. The color wasn’t a match for my boat and the quality was not close to what I wanted so I returned it. I it cost me $100 to ship it back and then it took them three weeks to refund my money... and insult to injury they charged me $45 “estimated taxes” and return the $39 actual taxed... nice little parting gift.
customer_reviews.author: Henry W.

customer_reviews.title: Captain Chairs
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and super comfortable. Alittle bit smaller than I expected but it turned out nice as I have more deck space in my boat.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Buy it but don’t let anything sit on it or you won’t ever get the stain out!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, stains REALLY easy... but well built and I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: William Arnder

customer_reviews.title: better not have larger than a 34" waist.
customer_reviews.text: this is more like a baby seat than a captains chair. If you have a 36" waist or bigger this thing will fit you like a pair of skinny jeans.
customer_reviews.author: david coen

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Well had them for about a month and I like them. Seem to be well built. Installed them in my Nordic Viking. Price very well
customer_reviews.author: Freddy40

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: This fit like a glove, made of pretty solid material no complaints here
customer_reviews.author: Rman

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you measure before buying. They were too small, but made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Materials and color?
customer_reviews.text: The seats are comfortable, they seem well built with good materials, time will tell. I wish leader accessories would list the material they use and the color so I could match the seats in the bow and stern seats as I am refurbishing a boat and have to make these cushions. Good product. I like the extra height I get from the lift up bolster. 1988 bayliner 1700 capri 2.3 litre.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, excellent construction
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, excellent construction, hole pattern for bracket was close to my 30 yr bracket. Comfortable. Just a little too deep of a seat for me but it'll do.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin_MEI

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stainless hardware
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality. Excellent stainless hardware. Sturdy bolster mechanism. Bolted right up to my 5x5 pedestal. My 12x5 needed to be modified slightly as holes were less than 12 but no big deal. Nice color of white. Carbon fiber gray material is really attractive. Good seats.
customer_reviews.author: Big W

customer_reviews.title: Seat works great!
customer_reviews.text: This seat worked great for the boat. The hinges for the bolster are metal which is great. Our old seat had plastic hinges that broke. The seat is a little hard but still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: did not even make it three months for discoloring
customer_reviews.text: The seat from one season which is about two months in this area the white vinyl has started yelling out
customer_reviews.author: Mamaaa

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: Seems like good material, sturdy build but the least comfortable seat I’ve had. They need to add just a little more padding and it could be great
customer_reviews.author: Devan B.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last more than 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Nice seat. Easy to install. However after a few weeks of use the aluminum struts that support the flip up seat bent. Now the flip up portion won't go all the way up or down. Really didn't abuse it or over use it. Just soft aluminum. Won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and was very easy to install with what I have on my 2003 Rinker 232 Captiva
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy Fabyan

customer_reviews.title: Not Quality
customer_reviews.text: the screw inserts broke 3 weeks after install.. not a quality product
customer_reviews.author: pedro

customer_reviews.title: easy install. Greatly improved the look AND feel of ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality, easy install. Greatly improved the look AND feel of my old boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice seats
customer_reviews.text: Nice seats. Mount to a four bolt pattern pedestal. Comes with bolts and washers too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Love the chairs. I bought two for my Yamaha jet boat. Better then original.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Sorol

customer_reviews.title: They look much better than the old
customer_reviews.text: These were relatively inexpensive replacements. They look much better than the old, worn seats. The bolsters flip up/down pretty easily so you have to pay attention when they are in the up position.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen N.

customer_reviews.title: boat seat
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this seat after i put it in the boat, It looked so good I pulled all seat and took them in to be recoved to match this one. over all outstanding seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jay T Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be the same quality and looks as the similar seat Bass Pro sells but at literally half the price, and free shipping. What’s not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Schwietness

customer_reviews.title: Install was easy with existing hardware in boat
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as distribed. Install was easy with existing hardware in boat. Chair has 4 bolts in the bottum. Simply unscrew. And remount with hardware
customer_reviews.author: John Hargrave

customer_reviews.title: Seat is comfortable and will not rot
customer_reviews.text: Seat is comfortable and will not rot. Worked well with a short pedestal to install a captain chair in a Yamaha 212x that came with a bench seat.
customer_reviews.author: Educator

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Look good in boat, very comfortable everything is as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Making my 87 Baja Force 200 look new again
customer_reviews.text: These boat seats are very high quality and priced very affordable. Really Happy Joe
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cimino

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. Easy to install. Look great. Replaced the ripped front seats of a 2001 Glastron.
customer_reviews.author: KC141

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat
customer_reviews.text: Soft, color was spot on. Stand up feature is the best.
customer_reviews.author: shawn maxfield

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair
customer_reviews.text: Much better than expected. I would buy it again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Navy Wife

customer_reviews.title: Color fade....
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with this seat is that after a month the color faded from a nice rich red to pink......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seat is great. Color matches perfect with the rest of our boat. Seat is comfortable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great quality, easy to install. Won’t know how it does on the water for a couple more weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on a nice flip up bolster seat. Wonderful upgrade for our older boat.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Dawson

customer_reviews.title: It lined up perfect on our Weeres Pontoon and is very well put ...
customer_reviews.text: Easiest install ever! It lined up perfect on our Weeres Pontoon and is very well put together. Great quality also.
customer_reviews.author: Regina M Burrell

customer_reviews.title: No headline needed
customer_reviews.text: The seats look great and work as good as they look Thanks
customer_reviews.author: ROB DAVIDSON

customer_reviews.title: They tend to jam trying to change the bolster. ...
customer_reviews.text: They tend to jam trying to change the bolster. have to use a screw driver to separate the thin aluminum bars.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looked better than the pictures, arrived quickly and damage free
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Quality Seat
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality seat fit my runabout better than the original
customer_reviews.author: Stan Kingett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Mounted easily and appears to be of good quality and workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with these seats Price was good. They are comfortable. Look exactly like the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnna L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bleed at seams, save your money, & try a different brand
customer_reviews.text: The seats are nice as long as they dont get wet. Once they got wet they started turning pink on the seams. They didn't even last a year. I'm very disappointed. They are also not very comfy when the bottom part of the seat is up. It is too narrow , but if you sit in it with it down it is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent seat, good support and comfortable. Easily replaced my original stock seat.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wood

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems to be of the higher standard. It shipped fast and recieved it before the expected arrival date. The one issue I have is that the bolt holes DID NOT line up and if I didn't have the knowledge and tools to correct this issue, I would of given this a one star. Otherwise it's a nice seat.
customer_reviews.author: philip shipe

customer_reviews.title: For children
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality seat but so small. These are great for children. Average size adults....no way are they comfortable. Small adults and children in a small boat would work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO INSTALL TO THE EXISTING HARDWARE AND VERY COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: REPLACED BRIDGE HELM SEAT ON MY MERIDIAN. EASY TO INSTALL TO THE EXISTING HARDWARE AND VERY COMFORTABLE.
customer_reviews.author: DONUTFORME

customer_reviews.title: Blue color
customer_reviews.text: Got new seat in and thought it was the blue in pictures but it was much darker then picture love seat but not the blue color in pictures not happy about color at all
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Look great and fit in well with original seats. Had to drill out additional fixing holes but that was easy. The padding on the seat is a little thin so not as comfortable as my others but still a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These seats are so comfortable. The front part that lifts is also a ...
customer_reviews.text: These seats are so comfortable. The front part that lifts is also a great touch. Love these seats.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M

product_meta.title: Leader Accessories Two Tone Captains Bucket Seat Boat Seat Premium Sports Flip Up Boat Seat
feature_bullets: High-density foam padding and ergonomically design provides maximum support
Stainless steel fasteners and high impact rotational molded boat seat frame
Work with universal 5"x 5" or 5"x 12" mounting bolt pattern, mounting screws and washers included

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
